thread.title: Little beach in Ibitipoca

title: Little beach in Ibitipoca
text:
Only registered TrekEarth members may write critiques. Photographer's Note 
Created in 1973, the Ibitipoca State Park covers an area of 1,488 hectares full of caves, hiking trails, peaks, waterfalls, lush vegetation and streams whose tones range from honey to red quartzite thanks to concentrate on the rocks. Walking is a great program in the reserve, where the extreme sports is prohibited. It's walking that discover the most beautiful corners of that piece delighted the Serra da Mantiqueira. 
Nobody has marked this note useful
